attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many foreign vehicles come to this country not paying for the use of our roads, while the British public do, via road tax. The UK should charge a tax like they do in Belgium, Holland etc.£5 per day per vehicle, would make a fortune for this government, plus paying for road repairs etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
